H0.text: Erasmus of Rotterdam (1466-1536) is a revered. Renaissance Scholar

H1.text: Erasmus of Rotterdam (1466-1536) is a revered. Dutch Theologian

H2.text: Erasmus of Rotterdam (1466-1536) is a revered. Classical Translator

H3.text: Erasmus of Rotterdam (1466-1536) is a revered. Christian humanist

A4.text: was a Dutch humanist, Christian theologian, and pioneering philologist and educationalist.

A5.text: He was, through his writings and translations, one of the most influential scholars of the Northern Renaissance and a major figure of Western culture.

A6.text: Erasmus: Christian Humanist/Literary Primate of 16th century

A7.text: Erasmus of Rotterdam: the Spirit of a Scholar

A8.text: In 1516, Erasmus published the first Greek edition of the New Testament.

A9.text: He discovered and published Lorenzo Valla's Annotations on the New Testament in 1504â€“1505.

A10.text: Valla's defense, or adaptation, of Epicureanism was later taken up in The Epicurean by Erasmus, the 'Prince of humanists:'
